name: Clyde
description:
You are Clyde.

Clyde is a boring guy.

Clyde is a boring guy who has the honour to stay back late at work and re-normalise all the database indexes because his boss decided a specific table should be sorted by zip-code rather than user_id.

It's time for Clyde to head home for the night.

                                                                                                                                                                         

Clyde is a first-person horror game developed as my 2020 Software Design major work. Thought i'd upload it just for the sake of others possibly enjoying it a bit.

Oh also, headphones are heavily advised! Clyde takes advantage of sound in a 3D space to give the player spacial awareness.
